Listado de Héroes

Héroe borrado {{ deletedHero }}

No ha borrado nada.
  • {{ name }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-heroes-list', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.css'] }) export class ListComponent { public heroNames: string[] = ['Spiderman','Ironman','Hulk','She Hulk', 'Thor']; public deletedHero?: string; removeLastHero():void { this.deletedHero = this.heroNames.pop(); } }
